effect.sword_shield: User and target switch abilities. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: User and target switch abilities. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.
effect.the_crown_tundra: User and target switch abilities. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: User and target switch abilities. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.
effect.legends_arceus: User and target switch abilities. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. If either Pokémon has multitype or wonder guard, this move will fail.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.
